text: Maartin Allcock (born Martin Allcock; 5 January 1957 â€“ 16 September 2018) was an English multi-instrumentalist musician and record producer. He was born in Middleton, England. He was known for his works with Fairport Convention, Jethro Tull, and Robert Plant. Allcock died September 16, 2018 from liver cancer at the age of 61. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1957 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from liver cancer Category:English guitarists Category:British violinists Category:English record producers Category:Musicians from Manchester Category:People from Rochdale
title: Maartin Allcock
